front.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology--Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX(TM))--Part 1: System Application Program Interface (API)--Amendment 5: Advanced Realtime Extensions [C Language]
front.abstract: This standard is part of the POSIX series of standards for applications and user interfaces to open systems. It defines the applications interface to system services for synchronization, memory management, time management, and thread management. This standard is stated interms of its C language binding.
